thread.title: Excellent hotel in great location very friendly staff
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel in great location very friendly staff - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, Trafalgar Square, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: gpmmartin
title: Excellent hotel in great location very friendly staff
text:
The hotel is in a great location and the staff were very friendly the check in was smooth and we were given a very nice room.
Overall a very enjoyable stay and I would return to the hotel in the future when i return to London.
